divs: Sighting DetailsI was laying horizontal on the balkony just watching the sky when suddenly a bright silver "ball" showed up at SW and breezed to SE in an incredible speed without any sound or contrails and much faster than an airplane. I thought "WTF??" and my little dog left the balkony. Then it disappeared in a cloud and was not seen again.
Summary: fast silver "ball" breezed from SW so SE while I was laying on the balkony
trends: There have been no other sightings in Hadamar
This sighting has never been favorited.
